Articles.Content:
My goal was to get 10 kerbal to the moon, return 2 of them home and deploy a rover

First picture shows the lander

First picture shows the lander

No it doesn't.

Post this on mission reports.

Sorry I was unable to upload the photoes, the rocket crashed on impact the rockets came off all kerbal s susvived the rover was dropped from about 100 m when I ran out of fuel and knew I would crash, I flipped it upright and set it on its way the command pod susvived and all the science kerbals in the pods all susvived, over all it was a fail, at least I could use the rover to explore, i found a monolith I had a kerbal land on it and it crashed my computer, I lost where I found it and I checked it out it was a never before seen monolith so I am pissed but still glad, I a soon going to launch another rocket to collect Jed and the others stuck there.
Ok next time I will post it o mission reports, thanks for the advice

I'll move it instead, no need to make a new thread

So yeah, I'm moving this to mission reports.
